response.overview: Since she was a child, Aurora has always wanted to defend the world from evil monsters, while for her sister Emma, monsters can only exist in fairy tales. When an unexpected event compel them to confront reality once again, Emma will be forced to question her beliefs: maybe, monsters do really exist.
response.tagline: Aurora must prove to her sister Emma that monsters don't exist only in fairy tales.
response.title: L'Attaque
